title: Collaborative Learning Program to Strengthen Inquiry-Based Mathematics Lesson Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary math concepts and experience designing simple instructional sessions
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing inquiry-based lesson design through collaborative activities using personal devices and real-world problem-solving.

learning_goals: Derive three or more inquiry-based mathematics lesson design elements based on the Knowledge Integration (KI) framework
Present two or more validity evaluation criteria for inquiry activity design plans through collaborative feedback processes
Complete a mathematics lesson scenario that promotes student-led inquiry activities using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
